content: **quick doily** a crochet quick doily for you to make in just an hour or so made with a combination of double_crochet and single_crochet with a pretty edge to finish the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english **please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog www crochetncreate com** finished sizes is approx - 9 5 diameter level easy copyright ©2019 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern
